Fact: checking: The expert may have conducted a fact-checking process to verify the accuracy of the claim. This could involve researching official statements, interviews, or speeches made by Netanyahu to confirm whether he did or did not change his position on a two-state solution.
Cross: referencing sources: The expert may have cross-referenced multiple reliable sources, such as news articles, official government statements, or expert opinions, to gather additional evidence and perspectives on the claim.
